short_summary: Interior Demolition on Bedford Institute of Oceanography Campus
description: demolition on 3 levels of Murray Building for future full renovation The building is connected to the campus but is vacant but needs to be taken down with the remains being taken
full_summary:
# Murray Building Interior Demolition Invitation to Qualify

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors who pre-qualified under the recent Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process to submit a bid for the Murray Building Interior Demolition project.

## Project Details

The project involves the interior demolition of three levels of the Murray Building on the Bedford Institute of Oceanography campus. The building is vacant, but connected to the campus, and will remain accessible for the duration of the project. The project scope includes the removal of asbestos in certain areas, and a Hazardous Material Report will be provided as part of the tender package.

## Important Notes

* This opportunity is only open to contractors who pre-qualified under the recent ITQ process. If you did not participate in this phase, you are not eligible to submit a bid for this project.
* The successful contractor will be responsible for ensuring a safe working environment, and adhering to all relevant regulations and standards.

## Tender Details

* Tender Number: WS4253892965-Doc4287162319
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: November 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 27, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 22, 2023
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Notice URL: None

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Richard Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
